item.description:
We’re going to a HOLIDAY GALA at West Valley Inn in W. Warwick for December’s dinner !!! 

Doors open at 6:30 for cocktails.   CASH BAR.    Dinner served at 7:30 

Party DJ will be “Music Express”.

 

Here’s the menu: 

Hot & Cold Hors D’oeuvres (served buffet style)

-         Raw Veggie Tray w/dips

-         Cheese & Fruit Tray w/crackers

-         Assorted Gourmet Pizza Rounds

-         Spinach Rolls

-         Calamari w/sauce

-         Italian Anitpasto Tray

-         Chicken Wings w/blue cheese dressing

-         Marinated Grilled Vegetables

 

Dinner

-         Fresh Garden Salad

-         Family Style Penne Pasta

-         Choice of:

- Boneless Breast Chicken Marsala   $39.00

- Roast Prime Rib   $42.00

  or

- Baked Stuffed Shrimp    $42.00

 

Served with: Baked Potato, California Medley, Italian Bread w/butter, Raspberry Truffle Ice Cream Pie, Coffee, Tea or decaf

You may RSVP for the dinner here at any time, however, I MUST HAVE your FULL PAYMENT no later than November 26.  At that time, I will make our reservation (and meal choices) and pay the West Valley Inn in full.

NO REFUNDS after November 26 if your plans change and you do not attend the dinner.

You may pay me with cash the next time we see each other, you can mail me a money order or you can use PayPal.   If you pay by PayPal, the chicken dinner will be $40.50 (including PayPal fees) and the Prime Rib or Shrimp dinner  will be $43.60 (including PayPal fees).  Since everyone who has RSVP'd so far has selected prime rib or shrimp, I have set $43.60 as the price for the meetup.  If you would like chicken for dinner, I will give you $3.10 change the night of the dinner.

When you RSVP, you must tell me your meal selection and how you would like to pay me.

Are you interested in having a group Yankee Swap before or after dinner ?   $20.00 limit gift for either a man or woman.
item.how_to_find_us: I will make a reservation on November 27

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: December HOLIDAY GALA Dinner at West Valley Inn, W Warwick !!
